sources.title: Pharaoh's Curse
sources.description: Title: Pharaoh's Curse Summary: Archaeologists in Egypt find one of their crew has been turned into a blood sucking mummy after they have unleashed a three thousand year curse by entering a Pharaoh's tomb. Directed by: Lee Sholem Actors: Mark Dana, Ziva Rodann, Diane Brewster Production Company: Schenck-Koch Productions Release Date: February 1957 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Archaeologists in Egypt find one of their crew has been turned into a blood sucking mummy after they have unleashed a three thousand year curse by entering a Pharaoh's tomb.

metadata.Plot: Archaeologists in Egypt find one of their crew has been turned into a blood sucking mummy after they have unleashed a three thousand year curse by entering a Pharaoh's tomb.
